dict.string: ---+Twiki White Paper Template --- |*Document Title:*|  ${1:[TITLE]}| |*Author's Name:*|  ${2:[AUTHOR]}| |*Department:*|  ${3:[DEPARTMENT]}| |*Author's Phone Number:*|  ${4:[PHONE NUMBER]}| |*Email Address:*|  [[mailto:${5:author@lexmark.com} ${6:Author's Email Address}]]| |*Version Number:*|  ${7:[VERSION (e.g. 0.1)]}| |*Revision Date:*|  ${8:[DATE (mm/yy/dd]}| |*Confidentiality Warning:*|  This document contains information of a proprietary nature and is classified Lexmark Confidential. No information herein shall be divulged to persons other than Lexmark employees or external persons covered by an active Lexmark Confidential Disclosure Agreement (CDA), authorized by the nature of their duties to receive such information. This document is the property of Lexmark International Inc. Lexmark is a trademark of Lexmark International Inc., all rights reserved.| %TOC% --- ---++Summary Information ---+++_Brief Introduction_ * [REPLACE THIS TEXT with a paragraph that describes this white paper’s functionality; be specific enough that a reader can understand the new functionality BUT general enough that this information won’t need to be updated with each revision of the document]$0 ---+++_Development and Implementation Objectives_ * [REPLACE THIS TEXT with a brief explanation of the business issues that will be solved by the white paper’s functionality; if applicable, this section should identify specific MRD requirements that are satisfied by the functionality] ---+++_Affected Products_ * [REPLACE THIS TEXT with a list of the products that will receive the functionality discussed in this white paper] ---+++_Affected Subsystems_ * [REPLACE THIS TEXT with a list of major subsystems (such as Engine, RIP, GUI, etc.) that will be affected by the functionality discussed in this white paper] ---+++_Target Audience_ * [REPLACE THIS TEXT with a list of the departments for whom this white paper is written] ---+++_Required Reviewers_ * [REPLACE THIS TEXT with a list of the key individuals (and their departments) who are responsible for reviewing and giving feedback on this white paper; these individuals are key since each of them must sign-off on this document before it can be deemed version 1.0] --- ---++Revision History *Version 0.1* ([REPLACE THIS TEXT with the date on which this document was created]) * Document created --- ---++Main Content [REPLACE THIS TEXT with the content that should appear in the main body of this white paper] --- ---++Known Issues [REPLACE THIS TEXT with a bulleted list of the large unknown or unresolved issues (including legal issues) that will affect the development and/or implementation of this functionality; FOR EACH ISSUE, USE THE FORMAT “2/7/06: Example issue”] [WHEN AN ISSUE IS RESOLVED, strike-through the issue; DON’T DELETE IT (for example, Example resolved issue] [IF NO ISSUES APPLY, enter the text “This page intentionally blank” at the top of this page] --- ---++Other Resources [REPLACE THIS TEXT with a list of other resources (such as documents or URLs) that provide more information about this white paper’s functionality] [THIS SECTION SHOULD ALWAYS INCLUDE a reference to the project’s Marketing Requirements Document (MRD)]
